Title: Those Kinds of Things
Plot: Dexter shows up at his 20th high-school reunion with the intention of confronting the former prom king. Elsewhere, an investigation into a heinous murder with religious overtones leads Dexter to ponder spiritual matters and wonder about his son's legacy. And an unexpected situation results in Debra becoming a hero.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Geoff Pierson, Aimee Garcia, John Brotherton, Kristen Miller, Michael Hyatt, Brea Grant
